data.title: Song lyrics
data.solution:
n = int(input())
lyrics = [input() for i in range(n)]

m = int(input())
l = 0
for i in range(m):
    line = input()
    while not lyrics[l] == line:
        l += 1
    l += 1
    print(lyrics[l])
    l += 1
data.statement:
Simeon and the Frog plan to attend a concert of their favorite band. To sing along, they learn the songs by heart. They write a program that can display the next line of the song, so they can get ready to sing along at the top of their lovely voices!
 
You are given the [[N]] lines of song lyrics. For each of the [[M]] lines they recognize during the concert, print the next line of the song lyrics. Make sure, you keep track of the order, so you know which part of the song was played already:

For the first heard line, find the first occurrence in the song and output the next line. For each following heard line, find the first occurrence in the song after the previous heard line and output the next line. Beware, because you sing so loud, the next heard line is never the line that your program just wrote!

testCases.title: Alle meine Entchen
testCases.testIn:
5
Alle meine Entchen
Schwimmen auf dem See
Schwimmen auf dem See
Köpfchen in das Wasser
Schwänzchen in die Höh’
2
Alle meine Entchen
Köpfchen in das Wasser
testCases.testOut:
Schwimmen auf dem See
Schwänzchen in die Höh’

testCases.title: Fuchs, du hast die Gans gestohlen
testCases.testIn:
6
Fuchs, du hast die Gans gestohlen
Gib sie wieder her, gib sie wieder her
Sonst wird dich der Jäger holen
Mit dem Schießgewehr
Sonst wird dich der Jäger holen
Mit dem Schießgewehr
2

Mit dem Schießgewehr
testCases.testOut:

Sonst wird dich der Jäger holen

testCases.title: Saviour Machine
testCases.testIn:
10
From the dawn of time
Man has always sought peace
But war has been the terror of his legacy
The horror of his fate
The final hours of history...
For as long as man
Stands at war with his God
He will be condemned to stand at war
With himself and his seed
Behold, the greatest conspiracy...
3
From the dawn of time
For as long as man
With himself and his seed
testCases.testOut:
Man has always sought peace
Stands at war with his God
Behold, the greatest conspiracy...

testCases.title: Brian Doerksen
testCases.testIn:
10
No other way to be reconciled,
to receive complete forgiveness
No other choice could have set us free,
could have paid the price of justice
So I come, as I am, to the place where mercy meets me
I see the cross
I see the cross,
lifted high for all to see
I see the cross,
it's the love the nations need
2
I see the cross
I see the cross,
testCases.testOut:
I see the cross,
it's the love the nations need

I'll bleed forever
My fall will be for you
My love will be in you
If you be the one to cut me
I'll bleed forever

Brings me to thee
Into the blue memory

testCases.title: Cradle of Filth
testCases.testIn:

By night and by candle
At each other's throat
In a slick drift of red
Setting god's teeth on edge
We were as wolves preying inside the fold
Of a slaughtered lamb throw
On a four poster bed...
Succulent, Succubus
Laid without rest
In the dead of the night
Succulent, Succubus
4
In a slick drift of red
We were as wolves preying inside the fold
On a four poster bed...
In the dead of the night
testCases.testOut:
Setting god's teeth on edge
Of a slaughtered lamb throw
Succulent, Succubus
Succulent, Succubus

data.constraints:
5 ≤ [[N]] < 20
2 ≤ [[M]] < 10
There is always at least one line in the song after the last heard line.
data.stubGenerator:
read N:int
loop N read line:string(100)
read M:int
loop M read line:string(100)
loop M write next line in song
data.inputDescription:
<<Line 1:>> Number of lines in song [[N]]
<<Next [[N]] lines:>> Song lyrics
<<Next line:>> Number of heard lines [[M]]
<<Next [[M]] lines:>> Heard lines
data.outputDescription: <<[[M]] lines:>> The next line for each of the heard lines
